TopicTitle: Should there be a contest for Pre-built Ships?

Articles.Content: Hello everyone, I wanted to post an Idea. Do you think that there should be a friendly contest where HarvesteR will post what he wants each ship to achieve and then everyone on the forums can build them and have a chance of them being put into 0.17?
I voted for Squad to make them, because I'd like to see the 0.17 ships to actually include the new parts that are coming
This is a good idea. Perhaps only the testers should submit craft designs, to lower the number of entries the team has to go through. But the testers could take ideas from the rest of the community.

It would be awesome if we made them. However, if squad makes them they can incorporate things that has to do with the upcoming campaign and can use new parts. They can also put in purposefully bad ships to mess with the newbies

So I'm going to go with Squad making them. Good idea though!

There was an amazing stock spaceshuttle design that I found. I really do think this should be added into the game. http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/xrotk/finally_after_weeks_of_work_i_present_to_you_the/
